name: BCP_tm
brief: Tree Manager process for BCP Branch-Cut-Price framework

algorithms.name:
Tree Manager: Parallel B&B Coordinator with Distributed Scheduling

The Tree Manager (TM) coordinates the entire BCP algorithm:
- Manages the search tree and candidate node selection
- Tracks global upper/lower bounds
- Schedules work to LP processes
- Stores variables/cuts both locally and distributed

**Key classes:**
- BCP_tm_prob: Central TM state (search tree, bounds, problem core)
- BCP_tm_stat: Statistics (wait time, queue length by LP count)
- BCP_slave_params: Parameter sets for LP/CG/VG processes

**Process coordination:**
- lp_procs: Vector of LP process IDs
- active_nodes: Map from process ID to current node
- candidate_list: CoinSearchTreeManager for node selection

**Bound tracking:**
- lower_bounds: Multiset of unexplored node bounds
- upper_bound: Best known feasible solution value
- lb_multiplier: Floor(lb*multiplier) to avoid rounding errors

see: BCP_lp.hpp for LP process that receives work
